title: Cloverleaf on Quartz (Broadwell) fails to build with Intel compiler.
body:
#### Summary
Failed to build Cloverleaf on Quartz with Intel compiler.

#### Expected Result
Build for Cloverleaf succeeds with Intel.

#### Actual Result

```console
$ spack install cloverleaf %intel
==> libsigsegv is already installed in /usr/WS2/variorum/am/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/intel-19.0.4.227/libsigsegv-2.12-4ivtjvsojeu2mddrgocwakduqwuy7dua
==> m4 is already installed in /usr/WS2/variorum/am/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/intel-19.0.4.227/m4-1.4.18-aqqcpnzqufvb76u2zzbrwwqbwnqjhopg
==> libtool is already installed in /usr/WS2/variorum/am/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/intel-19.0.4.227/libtool-2.4.6-fjbx2bqqds2jr2gc3etpggpi63xbxf3l
==> pkgconf is already installed in /usr/WS2/variorum/am/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/intel-19.0.4.227/pkgconf-1.6.3-46zuyul3icaj6yqk5k6ubrrjhkjlap3y
==> util-macros is already installed in /usr/WS2/variorum/am/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/intel-19.0.4.227/util-macros-1.19.1-lcbyurd3m3njtf3m35lqgf75bqskcpir

==> xz is already installed in /usr/WS2/variorum/am/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/intel-19.0.4.227/xz-5.2.4-cz7cqq5o5jdw2mmbcog5v76rvosyj4wq
==> zlib is already installed in /usr/WS2/variorum/am/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/intel-19.0.4.227/zlib-1.2.11-muqzsvyhvenmv5ii2da3jcq5pp6cy5wq

==> gdbm is already installed in /usr/WS2/variorum/am/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/intel-19.0.4.227/gdbm-1.18.1-uqfzosrxxy5ctuk2aviju6ra6bv7h45m

==> Building cloverleaf [MakefilePackage]
==> Executing phase: 'edit'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16' '--directory=CloverLeaf_ref' 'MPI_COMPILER=/usr/WS2/variorum/am/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/intel-19.0.4.227/openmpi-3.1.5-57wm7zqnseeu6qvo4dxfmnihn4an7iyw/bin/mpif90' 'C_MPI_COMPILER=/usr/WS2/variorum/am/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-broadwell/intel-19.0.4.227/openmpi-3.1.5-57wm7zqnseeu6qvo4dxfmnihn4an7iyw/bin/mpicc' 'COMPILER=INTEL' 'FLAGS_INTEL=' 'CFLAGS_INTEL='

1 error found in build log:
     18    update_halo_kernel_c.c               \
     19    pack_kernel_c.c                      \
     20    generate_chunk_kernel_c.c    \
     21    initialise_chunk_kernel_c.c  \
     22    timer_c.c
     23    icc_orig: command line error: option '-openmp' is not supported. Please use the replacement option '-qopenmp'
  >> 24    make: *** [c_lover] Error 1
     25    make: Leaving directory `/tmp/marathe1/spack-stage/spack-stage-cloverleaf-1.1-vcx7effcroz27c4usx54t6cg5i6zsgpt/spack-src/CloverLeaf_ref'
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux quartz1538 3.10.0-1062.9.1.1chaos.ch6.x86_64 #1 SMP Mon Dec 16 13:50:10 PST 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 7.7 (Maipo)
```
